Class warGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • warGame

  • public class warGame
extends Object
    warGame is the class that has all the functionality that puts functionality of deck and card and creates the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      warGame()
      constructor that creates a deck and then proceeds to shuffle the deck

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cardWar()
      imitates what would happen if a "War" would occur takes the top card of both decks and puts them face down and then gets the next top card of both decks and puts them face up
      void deal()
      deals out the cards for the decks no return type
      void flip()
      gets the top card of both of the decks when called it will initate a flip sequence
      deck getHand()
      creates a hand from Deck
      int getOppCount()
      gets the size of your opponent's deck
      deck getOppHand()
      creates the opponents deck
      String getOppTopCard()
      gets the top card of your opponents deck while also getting the name of the card
      String getOppUpCard()
      gets the face up card of your opponent's deck while also getting the name of the card
      boolean getWarFlag()
      returns whether or not the warFlag if true or false
      String getWinningMsg()
      returns the String for the message
      int getYourCount()
      gets the size of your deck
      deck getYourHand()
      creates your cards in your deck
      String getYourTopCard()
      gets the top card of your deck while also getting the name of the card
      String getYourUpCard()
      gets the face up card of your deck while also getting the name of the card
      void winner()
      determines who won when both cards are played from their respectives deck, if you won then you get the cards, if opp won then the opp gets the cards, if the cards have the same rank then warFlag is switched to true and a War has begun

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
